q1: How far did they go in the World Cup?
a1: They reached the final but lost.
q2: Will Croatia do it again in 2018?
a2: They just did do it in 2018
a3: How far will Croatia make it at the next World Cup?
a4: I think they will come in 3rd.
q5: Who is the best player on Croatia?
a5: Luka Modric who plays for Spanish club Real Madrid and is also the captain of the Croatian team.
